original_text: So the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel, and he said, “Because this people have transgressed my covenant that I commanded their fathers and have not obeyed my voice,
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하여 이르시되 이 백성이 내가 그들의 조상들에게 명령한 언약을 어기고 나의 목소리를 순종하지 아니하였은즉

sentences.original_text: So the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 주님의 진노가 이스라엘을 향하여 타올랐으니

sentences.original_text: Because this people have transgressed my covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 이 백성이 내 언약을 어겼기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and have not obeyed my voice
